verses.verse: שִׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var ye this word הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I נֹשֵׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> no-Se which I take up עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem you קִינָ֖ה <S%H7015><s%> ki-Nah against you [even] a lamentation בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

נָֽפְלָה֙ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lah is fallen לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not תוֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> to-Sif she shall no more ק֔וּם <S%H6965><s%> Kum, rise בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lat The virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel נִטְּשָׁ֥ה <S%H5203><s%> nit-te-Shah she is forsaken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on אַדְמָתָ֖הּ <S%H127><s%> 'ad-ma-Tah upon her land אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There מְקִימָֽהּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> me-ki-Mah. [there is] none to raise her up

[it] in Bethel

[is] his name ס sa-Mek

הַמַּבְלִ֥יג <S%H1082><s%> ham-mav-Lig That strengtheneth שֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> shod the spoiled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon עָ֑ז <S%H5794><s%> 'Az; against the strong וְשֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> ve-Shod so that the spoiled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon מִבְצָ֥ר <S%H4013><s%> miv-Tzar against the fortress יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo. shall come
